name: Hidden Unreal
description:
A spiritual successor of the once popular always fun Hidden Source Mod for Half Life 2 made modern with Unreal Engine 4. 

The focus is to modernize the Hidden, bringing it to a modern game engine while preserving and expanding on what made the original Hidden Source so much fun. 

Hidden Unreal is a game where a difficult to see alien android controlled by a human player is pit against a team of soldiers sent out to neutralize this alien machine before it wrecks havoc to the population of Earth.  The soldiers are armed only with their weapons and your skill to track and take out this dangerous alien creature. The alien creature itself (the difficulty to see droid), has a knife, super human jumping, the ability to cling on to walls, and the ability to sense the presence as well as health of players on the map (dead or alive). The android can also feast on the flesh of dead soldiers to gain health as well as use props to to scare, hurt and taunt the soldiers.

Hidden Unreal is a work in progress and could use your support either via donations or play testing to help make this game as good (and better) than its predecessor. 

Join the Discord chat to speak with me and the active community directly https://discord.gg/Z8cTdu3

This project is not affiliated with the original developers of Hidden Source.
